data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original book chapter Deeleman-Reinhold, Christa (2001): Forest Spiders of South East Asia With a revision of the sac and ground spiders (Araneae: Clubionidae, Corinnidae, Liocranidae, Gnaphosidae, Prodidomidae and Trochanteriidae). In: Forest Spiders of South East Asia With a revision of the sac and ground spiders- Family Liocranidae. Leiden, Netherlands: Brill Leiden, Boston, Köln: 400-505, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.814704|204 occurrences
